page.title: 19MARKETS
page.content: A{Saturday Market}is held in Belper Market Place.There are 14 wooden stalls with tarpaulin roofs.A large {decorated Christmas tree}stands here at Christmas time. Goods on sale in the market include: cake,cheese,eggs,fruit,vegetables, cosmetics,household cleaning materials wool,antiques,jewellery and clothing. There is also a stall selling plants and flowers;plants are spread around the stall adding colour and excitement to the market.There is a fish van and one stall run by a local club or association for{charity. Many of the local factories including {Jaeger and Brettles_textile manufacturers_ and{J.W.Thornton, confectioners have factory shops, open to the public where sub_standard goods can be bought at reduced prices.
